listBusinessCategoryAllSql: SELECT ID, NAME, ICON, SORT FROM (SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_CATEGORY_PRESET WHERE ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM BUSINESS_CATEGORY_USER) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM BUSINESS_CATEGORY_USER) ORDER BY SORT
saveBusinessCategorySql: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO BUSINESS_CATEGORY_USER (ID,NAME,ICON,SORT) VALUES (@id,@name,@icon,@sort)
listPlaceholderByTemplateIdSql: SELECT PG.ID PGID,PG.NAME PGNAME,PH.ID PHID,PH.NAME PHNAME,PH.TYPE PHTYPE,PH.FORMAT PHFORMAT FROM PLACEHOLDER_GROUP PG INNER JOIN PH_GROUP_ITEM_REL GIR ON GIR.GID = PG.ID INNER JOIN PLACEHOLDER_ITEM PH ON GIR.PHID = PH.ID INNER JOIN TPL_PHGRP_REL TGR ON TGR.GID = PG.ID WHERE TGR.TPLID = @templateId ORDER BY TGR.SORT,GIR.SORT
listPlaceholderGroupByTemplateIdSql: SELECT PG.ID,PG.NAME FROM PLACEHOLDER_GROUP PG INNER JOIN TPL_PHGRP_REL TGR ON TGR.GID = PG.ID WHERE TGR.TPLID = @templateId ORDER BY TGR.SORT
listTemplateByBusinessCategoryIdSql: SELECT TPL.ID, TPL.NAME, TPL.PATH FROM TEMPLATE TPL LEFT JOIN BC_TPL_REL BTR ON TPL.ID = BTR.TPLID WHERE BTR.BCID = @businessCategoryId
updateTemplateSql: UPDATE TEMPLATE SET NAME=@name, PATH=@path, LASTCHANGE=@lastchange WHERE ID=@id
saveTemplateSql: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO TEMPLATE (ID,NAME,PATH,LASTCHANGE) VALUES (@id,@name,@path,@lastchange)
savePlaceholderItemSql: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO PLACEHOLDER_ITEM (ID,NAME,TYPE,FORMAT) VALUES (@id,@name,@type,@format)
savePlaceholderGroupSql: INSERT OR REPLACE INTO PLACEHOLDER_GROUP (ID,NAME) VALUES (@id,@name)
listOwnerlessTemplateSql: SELECT TPL.ID value, TPL.NAME text, TPL.PATH path FROM TEMPLATE TPL WHERE TPL.ID NOT IN (SELECT TPLID FROM BC_TPL_REL)
